attributes.action: rethink the government strategy on re-integrating (temporarily housing) offenders coming towards the end of their sentence or people awaiting trial who have no fixed home into communities where families own/ or part own their own homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A pilot scheme to house offenders coming to the end of their sentence and people who are awaiting trial with no fixed address are being housed in neighbourhoods where people have bought their own homes. We feel this will de-value surrounding homes and consequently make neighbourhoods less desirable.
